救护车担架, 救护车

sentences.sentence: He was carried off on a stretcher.
The two ambulance attendants quickly put Plover on a stretcher and got him into the ambulance.
sentences.translation: 这两名救护车的救护员迅速把普洛弗放在担架上并抬进了那辆救护车。

sentences.sentence: Toad may be brought back at any moment—on a stretcher, or between two policemen.
sentences.translation: 托德随时都可能被带回来——放在担架上，或者夹在两个警察中间。
